page.title: 02Housing
page.content: Some of the houses and cottages in { {Tintagel}are over five hundred years old.Most people live in bungalows or cottages.Others live in houses,semi detached,detached or terraced.Some of the children live in pubs,hotels or shops which their parents own.There are council houses at West Ground Way and The Butts.Some of the larger houses are made into flats but there are no large blocks.There are some people living all the year round in caravans on the local sites.People also live on farms. Modern appliances in use in homes include televisions,videos,vacuum cleaners,washing machines,tumble dryers,fridges,freezers,computers and nearly all homes have telephones and cars.
